content.text: Shrouded Fable draws you into a world where myth and mystery intertwine. Step into the shadows to uncover elusive Pokémon cloaked in legend, each hiding powerful abilities and deceptive strategies. Featuring Dark and Psychic-type synergy, Illusion mechanics, and cards that thrive on secrecy and surprise, this expansion challenges players to master the unknown. With haunting artwork and lore-rich designs, Shrouded Fable invites you to weave your own legend—where every move reveals another secret in the dark.
